definition: Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]

sentences.english: The deconstruction of the postmodernism will inevitably result in the collapsing of semantics.
sentences.chinese: 後現代主義解構的結果必然會導致語意的斷裂。

sentences.english: Winter wind semantic cold, Warm spring rain embellish mind sweet.
sentences.chinese: 寒冬風吹語意冷，暖春雨潤心思甜。

sentences.english: Uses fuzzy distance to describe the distance between the linguistic attributes in the similar cases.
sentences.chinese: 藉助語意距離來刻畫相似實例定性屬性間的距離。

sentences.english: With typical circumlocution, King Abdullah of Saudi Arabia recently said as much.
sentences.chinese: 沙特的阿卜杜拉國王最近也同樣語意婉轉說了不少。

sentences.english: Keep in mind Semantic Wiki requires a multi-step installation.
sentences.chinese: 留意語意維基需要多步安裝。

sentences.english: I guess it’s all about semantics, though, right?
sentences.chinese: 我猜這和語意有點關係，對不對？

sentences.english: They include the sound system and the way in which sounds and meanings are related.
sentences.chinese: 語法包括音系以及語音和語意之間聯繫的規則。

definition: my limited view (lit. view through a thin tube)/my limited understanding/my opinion (humble)
to convert to (a religion)/to rely upon/refuge/mainstay
brush stroke to the side (calligraphy)/fig. side stroke/lateral thinking
to transliterate/to transcribe/to transfer words onto a surface by direct contact (as with a decal)
one's four limbs/two arms and two legs
pausing at the end of a phrase or sentence (in former times, before punctuation marks were used)/punctuation/periods and commas/sentences and phrases
to make far-fetched claims (idiom)/to offer outlandish explanations
